Body:
path = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', 'UTESTA', 'UTESTA_MagIC')
sum_file = 'CoreSummary_XXX_UTESTA.csv'
program_ran, plot_name = ipmag.core_depthplot(input_dir_path=path, spc_file
    ='pmag_specimens.txt', samp_file='er_samples.txt', meth='AF', step=15,
    sum_file=sum_file, data_model_num=2)
self.assertTrue(program_ran)
outfile = 'UTESTA_m:_LT-AF-Z_core-depthplot.svg'
self.assertEqual(plot_name, outfile)
